field.label: Enable
field.help: This will activate the FreeRADIUS service.

field.label: Enable VLAN assignment
field.help: This allows you to dynamically assign VLANs on your physical switch ports.

field.label: Enable LDAP
field.help: This allows you to bind to an external LDAP server. Be aware that FreeRADIUS will not start if there is no further configuration.

field.label: Enable WISPr attributes
field.help: This enables the WISPr attributes assignment via users tab.

field.label: Enable ChilliSpot attributes
field.help: This enables the ChilliSpot attributes assignment via users tab.

field.label: Enable Mikrotik attributes
field.help: This enables the Mikrotik attributes assignment via users tab.

field.label: Enable Daily Session Limit
field.help: This enables the Max-Daily-Session attribute assignment via users tab.

field.label: Log to File or Syslog
field.help: Set where to log radius requests, defaults to file.

field.label: Log Authentication Request
field.help: Enable the logging of authentication requests, including MAC addresses.

field.label: Log Authentication Bad Password
field.help: Logs password if it is rejected.

field.label: Log Authentication Good Password
field.help: Logs password if it is correct.
